dict.string: We require access to your camera to allow you to capture photos for your profile or share them with customers within the app. For example, you can take a picture to upload as your profile image or take photos of the documents required for your order to be processed.

We require access to your gallery to allow you to use photos for your profile or share them with customers within the app. For example, you can use a picture to upload as your profile image or use pictures of the documents required for your order to be processed.

We require access to your gallery to allow you to use photos for your profile or share them with customers within the app. For example, you can use a picture to upload as your profile image or use pictures of the documents required for your order to be processed.
This app does not use Bluetooth directly. This is required by third-party libraries.
This app needs access to location when open.
This app needs access to location when in the background.
This app needs access to location when open and in the background.
